Oknum Anggota Ormas di Bekasi Lakukan Pemerasan Sambil Membawa Golok
06 Nov 2019, 01:10 by Riesty Yusnilaningsih
BEKASI, (PR).- Seorang oknum anggota ormas (organisasi kemasyarakatan) berinisial MA diamankan Kepolisian Resor Metro Bekasi Kota. MA dilaporkan korban yang mengalami pemerasan dengan amcaman senjata tajam.
Kepala Satuan Reserse Kriminal Polrestro Bekasi Kota Komisaris Arman mengatakan, MA membawa nama ormas yang menaunginya saat mencoba memeras.
"Saya tidak bisa menyebut nama ormasnya karena pelaku ini adalah oknum. Namun ormasnya termasuk yang ikut berunjuk rasa dan videonya viral di media sosial," kata Arman saat gelar perkara di Mapolrestro Bekasi Kota, Selasa 5 November 2019.
Video yang dimaksud memperlihatkan aksi unjuk rasa ormas yang ingin mengelola parkir di seluruh minimarket di Kota Bekasi. Dalam video berdurasi 8 menit itu, terlihat Kepala Badan Pendapatan Daerah Kota Bekasi Aan Suhanda yang menyetujui keinginan ormas mengelola parkir di minimarket.
Video tersebut menyebar melalui aplikasi percakapan media sosial, lengkap dengan narasi yang menyebut bahwa Kota Bekasi mendukung ormas menjadi pemeras pengusaha ritel.
"Sejak aksi unjuk rasa pada video yang terjadi pada 23 Oktober 2019, tidak ada laporan terkait aksi kekerasan. Namun pada Sabtu 2 November 2019, peristiwa ini terjadi," katanya.
Peristiwanya terjadi di depan pertokoan Harapan Baru, Kecamatan Medan Satria. Sekira pukul 22.00, MA yang dalam keadaan mabuk, meminta uang parkir kepada pengunjung toko dengan mengacungkan golok.
"Saat memaksa meminta uang, dia menyebut-nyebut nama ormasnya," kata Arman.
Saat korbannya memberikan uang Rp 150.000, MA menolak karena ingin lebih banyak. Melihat aksi pemerasan yang disertai ancaman senjata tajam, pelapor mencoba melerai, tapi justru membuat MA naik pitam.
"Pelapor dan korban tidak sampai dilukai, tapi pelaku segera kami amankan setelah laporan masuk," katanya.
Terhadap MA, polisi akan menjerat pasal pemerasan dan Undang-Undang darurat atas kepemilikan senjata tajam yang dibawa ke tempat umum.***

Persons Members of Civil Society Organizations in Bekasi Perform Extortion While Bringing Machetes
Nov 06 2019, 01:10 by Riesty Yusnilaningsih
BEKASI, (PR) .- An individual member of an organization (social organization) whose initials MA is secured by the Bekasi City Metro Police Department. The Supreme Court is reported to be a victim of extortion with the threat of a sharp weapon.
Head of the Bekasi City Police Criminal Investigation Unit, Commissioner Arman, said that the Supreme Court brought the name of the mass organization that sheltered him when he tried to blackmail.
"I cannot mention the name of the mass organization because this perpetrator is a person. However, the mass organization includes those who participated in the demonstration and the video was viral on social media," Arman said during his case at Mapolrestro Bekasi Kota, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
The video in question shows demonstrations by CSOs who want to manage parking in all minimarkets in Bekasi City. In the 8-minute video, we can see the Head of the Bekasi City Revenue Agency Aan Suhanda who agreed to the organization's desire to manage parking at the convenience store.
The video is spread through social media conversation applications, complete with narratives that say that Bekasi City supports mass organizations to exploit retail entrepreneurs.
"Since the demonstration on the video that took place on October 23, 2019, there have been no reports of violence. But on Saturday 2 November 2019, this event occurred," he said.
The incident occurred in front of the Harapan Baru shop, Medan Satria District. At around 22:00, the MA, who was drunk, demanded parking fees from shop visitors by brandishing a machete.
"When he insisted on asking for money, he mentioned the name of his organization," said Arman.
When the victim gave him Rp 150,000, the Supreme Court refused because he wanted more. Seeing extortion accompanied by the threat of sharp weapons, the rapporteur tried to break up, but instead made the Supreme Court furious.
"Reporters and victims have not been injured, but we will immediately secure the perpetrators after the reports have been submitted," he said.
Against the Supreme Court, the police will ensnare the extortion article and the Emergency Law on possession of sharp weapons brought to public places. ***
